import sys

def main():
    # Get input
    N, L = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    # Get the sum of all the N apples
    sumAll = sum(L+i for i in range(N))
    # Get the sum of all the N-1 apples
    sumN = sum(L+i for i in range(N-1))
    # Get the sum of the Nth apple
    sumNth = sumAll - sumN
    # Get the difference between the sum of all the N apples and the sum of all the N-1 apples
    diff = sumAll - 2*sumN
    # If the difference is negative, then the Nth apple is the one with the least absolute difference
    # Otherwise, the one with the least absolute difference is the one with the smallest flavor
    if diff < 0:
        print(sumAll - abs(sumNth))
    else:
        print(sumAll - abs(L))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
